definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Premium solvent, odourless and no harmful to skin.
sentences.chinese: 優質溶劑，無氣味，不傷皮膚。

sentences.english: Coal tar has a strong smell and can stain clothing.
sentences.chinese: 煤焦油有很強烈的氣味，並且會染污衣服。

sentences.english: She bent to touch the leaves of a plant or to smell a flower.
sentences.chinese: 她彎下腰去觸摸植物的葉子或花的氣味。

sentences.english: The hound picked up the fox's smell and started to chase after it.
sentences.chinese: 獵犬嗅出了狐狸的氣味，便開始跟蹤追趕。

sentences.english: He had a definite strain of snobbery in him.
sentences.chinese: 他這個人明顯有一股勢利小人的氣味。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the responses of housefly adults to different foods.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定家蠅成蟲對不同食物氣味的反應。

sentences.english: What if he used cedarwood to hide the pot smell?
sentences.chinese: 若他用香柏掩蓋大麻的氣味呢？

sentences.english: The sounds and smellsthatcame fromtheopen kitchen door appetizing.
sentences.chinese: 從敞着門的廚房飄進來的聲音和氣味讓人發饞。

sentences.english: It's a smell that's so good you want to smell it again, to get closer.
sentences.chinese: 那是一種是好聞到令你想靠得更近再聞一次的氣味。

sentences.english: The other half smelt a more neutral-smelling T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 另一半聞的是無氣味的T恤。

sentences.english: The room reeked of cheap perfume.
sentences.chinese: 房間裏瀰漫着劣質香水的嗆鼻氣味。

sentences.english: There, the wind carried a whiff from the cheeses full on to our steed.
sentences.chinese: 風把一股子奶酪的氣味直吹向我們的駿馬。

sentences.english: No fragrance or scent masking agents.
sentences.chinese: 沒有香味或氣味遮蓋劑。

sentences.english: "But everyone can see that you enjoyed the smell of my fried fish with your rice, " argued the woman.
sentences.chinese: 可人人都能看見你就着我的煎魚的氣味吃了米飯。

sentences.english: It even smells like in the real metro.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至聞起來都很像真實地鐵的氣味。

sentences.english: The Captain remarks to Davos that he can tell every city in Westeros by smell alone.
sentences.chinese: 每個城市有她自己獨特的氣味，像女人一樣。

definition: to smell/to sniff sth out/to perceive by smelling
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
